divs: sighting detailswas taking out trash approximately 7 am or so. saw presumed airliner with vapor trail in morning sun shining brightly. thought it would make a nice facebook post so pulled out i phone and snapped a photo (picture 1). too hard to see so i zoomed in and only got vapor trail (picture 2). wanted foreground trees for contrast so zoomed back out some as i re aimed i saw the light above the vapor trail and snapped a photo capturing the image below the vapor trail(picture 3). i watched the light\object go below the trail then above it and then go below it again and poof it was gone (picture 4 with same trees and vapor trail nut no light\object) it was up near a commercial plane apparently so i could see no details other than the bright light behind the plain seemingly circling the vapor trail. entire event was probably 3 to 5 seconds. thought i was nuts until i saw for sure i got a photo of it. no telling what it could have been but it did definitely move above and below the reference point of the vapor trail twice before vanishing in a downward motion. the photos i uploaded to fb and saved from there. truly besides being with an i phone they are not the greatest of quality.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Evant
There were no other sightings in Evant on or around November 8th 2012
Summary: Saw vaportrail in sunrise. Took photos and light appeared behind aircraft above vaportrail.Went below then above and vanished
